alert.note: Alert for Coke; Concho; Irion; Runnels; Schleicher; Sterling; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 10:34PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coke, northwestern Schleicher, southeastern Sterling, Tom Green, southwestern Runnels, northwestern Concho and eastern Irion Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1029 PM CDT, an area of thunderstorms with gusty winds was moving southeast across the Concho Valley. HAZARD...Fairly widespread winds of 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Mertzon, Paint Rock, Christoval, Maverick, Miles, Lowake, Wall, Grape Creek, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Veribest, Knickerbocker, Arden, Vancourt, Lake Nasworthy, Tankersley, Eola, Rowena, Orient and San Angelo State Park. People near Test event at NWS-SJT should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coke; Concho; Irion; Runnels; Schleicher; Sterling; Tom Green
